news.title: Weak password allowed hackers to sink a 158-year-old company
news.summary: Transport company KNP forced to shut down after international hacker gangs target thousands of UK businesses.

news.title: Asylum hotel protest escalated into 'mindless thuggery', police say
news.summary: Six people have been arrested during a protest outside a hotel used to house asylum seekers in Epping.

news.title: Future pensioners to be worse off, government warns
news.summary: Future pensioners are set to be worse off than today's with four-in-10 not saving enough for retirement, says the DWP.

news.title: £1m 'down the drain' as danger flats set to close
news.summary: Up to £1m of tenants' and taxpayers' money has been spent trying to fix Beech Rise and Willow Rise.

news.title: Japan's PM vows to stay on despite bruising election loss
news.summary: The result could destabilise Japan's government at a pivotal moment in trade negotiations with the US.

news.title: 'Doctors hold patients to ransom' and Lionesses 'stand with Jess'
news.summary: The resident doctors strike leads several of the papers before the planned five day walk out starts on Friday.

news.title: How Canada became the centre of a measles outbreak in North America
news.summary: Confirmed cases of measles in Canada are nearly three times higher than in the US, despite Canada's far smaller population.

news.title: 'A Day for Thorpey' to celebrate England batter
news.summary: The life of former England batter Graham Thorpe will be celebrated during the fifth Test against India at The Oval.

news.title: Powerful Ecuador drug lord 'Fito' extradited to US
news.summary: Adolfo Macías Villamar, alias "Fito", was captured a month ago in what police described as an underground bunker.

news.title: Farrell to captain Lions against Pasifika team
news.summary: Owen Farrell will make his first start of the tour in the British and Irish Lions' final midweek game against a First Nations and Pasifika XV on Tuesday.
